```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(astsa)
source('cleaning.R')
```

Deciding on signal model:

```{r}
ozone <- phoenix$o3
plot(ozone, type = 'l')

d365 <- diff(ozone, lag = 365)
plot(d365, type = 'l')

d1d365 <- diff(d365)
plot(d1d365[1:1000], type = 'l')

d1d1d365 <- diff(d1d365)
plot(d1d1d365[1:1000], type = 'l')
```

Pursuing stationarity:

```{r}
auto.arima(d1d365)

sarima(d1d365, p = 1, d = 0, q = 2)

```
